RecipeDef.label: Craft denture
RecipeDef.description: Crafts a cheap denture. Easy to make.

RecipeDef.label: Craft wooden foot
RecipeDef.description: Chops wood into a foot-like shape.

RecipeDef.label: install wooden foot
RecipeDef.jobString: Attaching wood log to the leg.

RecipeDef.label: Craft glass eye
RecipeDef.description: Grinds down a rock and uses the sand to produce a glass eye.

RecipeDef.label: craft crystal eye
RecipeDef.description: Carefully placing one glass eye inside antoher inside another creates a subtle reflective ring pattern. It's a very beautiful effect.

RecipeDef.label: Craft power claw
RecipeDef.description: Crafts a power claw. Can be attached to a bionic arm to create the power arm.

RecipeDef.label: craft power arm
RecipeDef.description: Attaching a power claw to a bionic arm is not as easy as it sounds. But damn is it awesome!

RecipeDef.label: Upgrade scyther blade
RecipeDef.description: Upgrades a scyther blade to a power claw.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced bionic ear implant
RecipeDef.description: Installs an advanced bionic ear implant.
RecipeDef.jobString: Installing an advanced bionic ear implant.
